attributes.action: stop the one 'bin bag' per week back door tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the council tax payer is already paying to have there rubbish collected and removed, we think it unfair to create another 'tax' on top of the already council tax.
We therefore ask for this stealth tax to be cancelled or a reduction in the already over priced council tax to cover the new tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
